# Normal { #water_tank.random.Normal }

`random.Normal(self, mean, std)`

Normal distribution, returning values with a mean of `mean` and a standard deviation of `std`.

## Parameters

| Name   | Type   | Description         | Default    |
|--------|--------|---------------------|------------|
| `mean` | float  | mean.               | _required_ |
| `std`  | float  | standard deviation. | _required_ |

## Methods

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [sample](#water_tank.random.Normal.sample) | Samples from the distribution and returns an array of the desired shape. |

### sample { #water_tank.random.Normal.sample }

`random.Normal.sample(shape)`

Samples from the distribution and returns an array of the desired shape.
